content: k2 twice p1 k4 p1 row 4 sl1p k7 ssk k1 turn k2 twice p1 k5 cont in this way adding one stitch between slip_stitch and ssk bbootthh ssoocckkss or p2tog on each row ie row 5 sl1p p8 p2tog p1 turn row using either the written instructions or chart available 6 sl1p k9 ssk k1 turn etc until all of the heel sts are used digitally using the qr code at the front of this pattern depending on how many sts are in your heel flap you may find and starting at round 1 work pattern as instructed below for that the k1 and p1 stitch is not required at the end of the last your size finishing on round 56 it may help to place markers two row on each side of the pattern panel knit across heel sts if required to bring you to the left hand rnds 1 56 k5 7 9 11 work 49 sts of pattern panel side of the heel flap with the outside of the flap facing you k6 8 10 12 ready to pick up 1 stitch for every 2 row of heel flap knitted remember that if you made the heel flap bigger you will need to pick up more stitches once you have picked up the lleefftt lleegg oonnllyy stitches place marker for new beginning of round work 30 32 34 36 sts of round 1 of foot instructions work across the top of the foot sts as per instructions below before starting heel flap and starting at round 1 on right foot panel and round 2 on left foot panel place marker then pick up 1 stitch for every 2 row of heel flap knitted up the other side of the heel knit across rriigghhtt lleegg oonnllyy the top of the heel and then shape gusset as below and at the finish one stitch before the end of the round slip the last same time working pattern as set across the top of the foot stitch from left needle to right remove stitch marker slip note if you are using dpns and/or have placed your stitches stitch from right needle to left needle and work on these sts on a stitch holder you can arrange the needles as follows for heel flap needle 1 for stitches across heel needle 2 for picked-up stitches down side of foot needle 3 for stitches across top of foot work stitches off stitch holder if required needle 4 for picked-up stitches on other side of foot you may find that stitch markers are not required at first 7 left foot right foot left foot panel written instructions right foot panel written instructions round 1 k4 p1 k2tog yo k1 p1 k3 twice p1 k2tog yo round 1 p1 k1 yo ssk p1 k3 twice p1 k1 yo ssk p1 k4 25 sts k1 p1 25 sts round 2 p1 k3 5 times p1 k4 round 2 k4 p1 k3 5 times p1
